metadata.purpose: Sample tasks testing workflow with burden of proof elements

sample_tasks.title: Establish Peter's Fiduciary Duty Breach - Civil Standard
sample_tasks.description: Gather evidence proving Peter breached fiduciary duties on balance of probabilities
required_evidence: Expert testimony on fiduciary duty standards
sample_tasks.success_criteria: Evidence package supporting >50% probability of breach

sample_tasks.title: Document Rynette's Criminal Conspiracy - Criminal Standard
sample_tasks.description: Compile evidence proving Rynette's criminal conspiracy beyond reasonable doubt
required_evidence: Communications showing agreement to commit crimes
Evidence of overt acts in furtherance of conspiracy
Financial records showing benefit from criminal acts
sample_tasks.success_criteria: Evidence excluding reasonable doubt of criminal conspiracy

sample_tasks.title: Prove Bantjies' Professional Misconduct - Mathematical Standard
sample_tasks.description: Create logical proof that Bantjies' conduct was necessarily improper
required_evidence: Logical elimination of all innocent explanations
sample_tasks.success_criteria: Logical proof admitting no alternative interpretation

sample_tasks.title: Test Multi-Party Civil Liability Framework
sample_tasks.description: Test workflow's ability to handle multiple defendants in civil context
sample_tasks.success_criteria: Workflow correctly processes multi-party civil liability

sample_tasks.title: Validate Evidence Chain Integration
sample_tasks.description: Test integration between burden of proof framework and evidence collection
sample_tasks.success_criteria: Seamless integration between proof standards and evidence collection
